sentences.en: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.cn: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.en: a statue in commemoration of a national hero
sentences.cn: 纪念民族英雄的雕像

sentences.en: Crowds shouted and pushed to get a glimpse of their hero.
sentences.cn: 为了一睹英雄的风采，人群喊叫着，推搡着。

sentences.en: Does your film make a hero of Jim Garrison?
sentences.cn: 您的影片是否将杰姆·加里森塑造成一名英雄人物？

sentences.en: Don Quixote, eponymous hero of the great novel by Cervantes
sentences.cn: 堂吉诃德—塞万提斯巨著中与书同名的主人公

sentences.en: England's World Cup hero is determined to play through the pain barrier.
sentences.cn: 英格兰的世界杯英雄决定带伤上阵。

sentences.en: He called Mr Mandela a hero who had inspired millions.
sentences.cn: 他称曼德拉先生为鼓舞了数百万民众的英雄。

sentences.en: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.cn: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.en: He was eulogized as a hero.
sentences.cn: 他被赞誉为英雄。

sentences.en: He was tall, dark and handsome, like a Mills and Boon hero.
sentences.cn: 他个头高大、皮肤黝黑、相貌堂堂，像通俗爱情小说的男主角。

sentences.en: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.cn: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.en: His father was a war hero, a former fighter pilot.
sentences.cn: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.en: Jack was a folk hero in the Greenwich Village bars.
sentences.cn: 在格林尼治村的酒吧里杰克是人们心目中的英雄。

sentences.en: Mild-mannered Stanley morphs into a confident, grinning hero.
sentences.cn: 性情温和的斯坦利变了，成了充满信心、笑口常开的英雄。

sentences.en: My boyhood hero was Bobby Charlton.
sentences.cn: 我童年时代的偶像是博比·查尔顿。

sentences.en: No matter, he remained the hero of the crowds.
sentences.cn: 不要紧，他仍是众人心目中的英雄。

sentences.en: Phileas Fogg, hero of Jules Verne’s ‘Around the World in Eighty Days’
sentences.cn: 斐利斯•福格，儒勒•凡尔纳《八十天环游地球》的男主人公

sentences.en: Singer Brett Anderson inspires old-fashioned hero-worship.
sentences.cn: 歌手布雷特·安德森唤起了旧式的个人崇拜狂潮。

sentences.en: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.cn: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主角于1929年去世。

sentences.en: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929. ＃
sentences.cn: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

sentences.en: The hero, Danny, bears an uncanny resemblance to Kirk Douglas.
sentences.cn: 主人公丹尼与柯克·道格拉斯出奇地相像。

sentences.en: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.cn: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

words.tran_cn: 英雄的；英勇的；记叙英雄及其事迹的；夸张的
英勇，英雄气概；英雄行为；勇敢的事迹

trans.tran_en: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave
